Use DT to output a tibble

DT_output.Rd

Use DT to output a tibble

Usage

DT_output(
  M,
  caption = "",
  filename = knitr::fig_path(),
  column = c("TI", "DI", "TC")
)

Arguments

M

a data.frame

caption

table caption

filename

download file of table

column

columns to show in M
